stories.text:
I am a high school sophomore interested in security. I built this tool to help people learn how to make strong passwords that are not only hard to guess, but also easy to remember. I built this using Python, Flask, and Bootstrap.

I would love your feedback, if any!
stories.title: Show HN: A tool to make strong passwords that are easy to remember
Shanghai starts lockdown due to Omicron surge

stories.text:
I'm the owner of a platform that helps founders scale their revenues. SparrowStartup.com.

Generally, founders at the same level, face the same ‘foundational’ types of issues with growth.

And so, I’m building out a Slack channel for founders in the $500 - $1000 MRR range so we can help each other out. I’m a marketplace founder, yes, but I have digital resources to help you scale.

Comment here if you’re interested and I’ll invite you. Must be $500MRR+
stories.title: Ask HN: Do you know SaaS founders $500 – $1000 MRR?

stories.text:
TradeCast screenshots are now available: https://tradecast.one. Scroll to the end of the page to see them.

This is a very minimal UI, intentionally, for automated crypto trading. The MVP is nearly ready.
stories.title: TradeCast Screenshots
